column2: Source: City of Toronto open data portal. The general quality and availability of this data source is poor. The 2017 dataset is not yet available from this data source. Caution: Revenues from 2011 -  2012 do not include propety tax. The 2016 dataset does not include Activities. The 2013 dataset is staff recommended. The data contain anomalies.Inter-divisional recoveries (2%-3%) are double counted. Roughly estimated re-allocations for continuity have been applied to the earlier years.
